title: SWE & Security Analyst
body: I am a recent graduate in Computational Systems Engineering and currently work at TBSEK in the field of cybersecurity. I have experience in Python and SQL, system and tool development, as well as projects involving data encryption, automatization, and backend. During my academic journey, I served as president of Hackztecs, where I strengthened my leadership skills by organizing tech sessions and fostering a learning community.
